meta.title: Side-by-side comparison of Diffix Fir and original data using the NYC taxi data
meta.author: Paul Francis
meta.excerpt: This heatmap visualization shows just how accurate Diffix anonymization can be, even down to the city block.

meta.title: Diffix Elm automates what statistics offices have been doing for decades
meta.author: Paul Francis
meta.excerpt: A good way to understand Diffix Elm's anonymization is that it automates the mechanisms that national statistics offices have been using for decades. This short and simple post explains how.
